description: Automate your Slack workspace interactions by posting messages, replying to threads, adding reactions, and fetching channel or user information. Streamline Slack communication and management with easy-to-use tools accessible via the Model Context Protocol. Enhance productivity by integrating Slack API capabilities directly into your workflows.

SLACK_TEAM_ID.description: The Slack Team ID for the workspace

SLACK_BOT_TOKEN.description: The Bot User OAuth Token for the Slack app

tools.name: channels_list_on_slack
tools.description: List public channels in the workspace with pagination

limit.description: Maximum number of channels to return (default 100, max 200)

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for next page of results

tools.name: send_message_on_slack
tools.description: Post a new message to a Slack channel. Provide either channel_id or channel_name.

channel_id.description: The ID of the channel to post to.

channel_name.description: The name of the channel to post to (will be resolved to channel_id if channel_id is not provided).

tools.name: reply_to_thread_on_slack
tools.description: Reply to a specific message thread in Slack. Provide either channel_id or channel_name.

thread_ts.description: The timestamp of the parent message in the format '1234567890.123456'. Timestamps in the format without the period can be converted by adding the period such that 6 numbers come after it.

channel_id.description: The ID of the channel containing the thread.

channel_name.description: The name of the channel containing the thread (will be resolved to channel_id if channel_id is not provided).

tools.name: get_channel_history_on_slack
tools.description: Get recent messages from a channel. Provide either channel_id or channel_name.

channel_name.description: The name of the channel (will be resolved to channel_id if channel_id is not provided).

tools.name: get_thread_replies_on_slack
tools.description: Get all replies in a message thread. Provide either channel_id or channel_name.

thread_ts.description: The timestamp of the parent message in the format '1234567890.123456'. Timestamps in the format without the period can be converted by adding the period such that 6 numbers come after it.

channel_id.description: The ID of the channel containing the thread.

channel_name.description: The name of the channel containing the thread (will be resolved to channel_id if channel_id is not provided).

tools.name: get_users_on_slack
tools.description: Get a list of all users in the workspace with their basic profile information

limit.description: Maximum number of users to return (default 100, max 200)

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for next page of results

tools.name: get_user_profile_on_slack
tools.description: Get detailed profile information for a specific user

tools.name: get_channel_messages_on_slack
tools.description: Fetch the last N messages from a Slack channel (by channel_id or channel_name).

channel_id.description: The ID of the channel to fetch messages from.

channel_name.description: The name of the channel to fetch messages from.

tools.name: get_mentions_on_slack
tools.description: Fetch recent messages where the bot/user is mentioned (optionally by channel).

limit.description: Number of mention messages to fetch (default 10)

channel_id.description: The ID of the channel to search mentions in (optional).

channel_name.description: The name of the channel to search mentions in (optional).
